quotes.quote: Employment is the surest antidote to sorrow.
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: It is light grief that can take counsel.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Grief is the agony of an instant, the indulgence of grief the blunder of a life.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Grief is Newark. It's there. Can't avoid it. The idea is to hold your nose, hope the traffic's not too bad and get on to Manhattan as quickly as possible.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Waste not fresh tears over old griefs.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

quotes.quote: The only cure for grief is action.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Even his griefs are a joy long after to one that remembers all that he wrought and endured.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It seems the misfortune of one can plow a deeper furrow in the heart than the misfortune of millions.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: While grief is fresh, every attempt to divert only irritates. You must wait till it be digested, and then amusement will dissipate the remains of it.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Grief teaches the steadiest minds to waver.
quotes.author: Trey Parker and Matt Stone

quotes.quote: The greatest griefs are those we cause ourselves.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I just realized that there's going to be a lot of painful times in life, so I better learn to deal with it the right way.

What's gone and what's past help
Should be past grief.
